**Rage4 DNS - Rage4 Partner - improve your DNS service**

About Rage4 DNS
- own anycast, dual stack network with points of presence on all continents except Antarctica,
- enterprise class features such as GeoDNS and failover support inlucing integration with UptimeRobot, ScaleXtreme, NewRelic and NodePing
- full API,
- cPanel and WHMCS modules

All Rage4 Partners have access to
- dedicated support,
- flat fee billing model

15EUR/month for each 75 domains
_or_
50EUR/month for each 250 domains
_or_
600EUR/year for each 500 domains

**Special promo for LET members: 5% discount for first 3 months**
